chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: soup
V: is_true (valid s)
s': soup
i: Ordered.sort mid
mm: msg TaggedMessage
j: Ordered.sort mid

Goal:
valid (s' \+ i \\-> mm) -> consume_msg (s' \+ i \\-> mm) j = (if i == j then s' \+ i \\-> mark_msg mm else consume_msg s' j \+ i \\-> mm)

Premises:
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
mark_msg : forall T : Type, msg T -> msg T
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (base c)). Record type : Type := Pack { sort : Type; _ : class_of sort } Definition sort : ordType -> Type. Definition
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x : ?T, ?a x} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [s : soup V : valid s s' : soup i : mid mm : msg TaggedMessage j : mid |- eqType] ?a : [s : soup V : valid s s' : soup i : mid mm : msg TaggedMessage j : mid |- pred ?T] ?s : [s : soup V : valid s s' : soup i : mid mm : msg TaggedMessage j : mid |- seq ?T]
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
big_pmorph : forall (R1 : Type) (R2 : pcm) (f : R2 -> R1) (id1 : R1) (op1 : R1 -> R1 -> R1), (forall x y : R2, valid (x \+ y) -> f (x \+ y) = op1 (f x) (f y)) -> f Unit = id1 -> forall (I : Type) (r : seq I) (P : pred I) (F : I -> R2), valid (bigop.BigOp.bigop Unit r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i PCM.join (P i) (F i))) -> f (bigop.BigOp.bigop Unit r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i PCM.join (P i) (F i))) = bigop.BigOp.bigop id1 r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i op1 (P i) (f (F i)))
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
post_msg = fun m : msg TaggedMessage => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
sorted_ins' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s : seq (K * V)) (k : K) (v : V), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- s] -> sorted ord [seq key i | i <- ins' k v s]
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
sorted_nil : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- [::]]
FinMap : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (seq_of : seq (K * V)), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of] -> finMap K V
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
supp = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s : finMap K V) => [seq key i | i <- seq_of s] : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), finMap K V -> seq K Arguments supp {K} {V}%type_scope
umE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType), (forall (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V), (k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2) = (k1 == k2) && (v1 == v2)) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (k \\-> v == Unit) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (Unit == k \\-> v) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (k \\-> v == um_undef) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (um_undef == k \\-> v) = false) * ((Unit == um_undef) = false) * ((um_undef == Unit) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K...
umPtPtUE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2 \+ f) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umUPtPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (f \+ k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umPtUPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 \+ f == k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umPtUPt2E : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 == f \+ k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
valid_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), valid (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = valid f
last_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), valid f -> last_key (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = fresh f
umUPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (f \+ k \\-> v == Unit) = false
umPtUE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k \\-> v \+ f == Unit) = false
umPtPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V), (k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2) = (k1 == k2) && (v1 == v2)
freeUnPt2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (f \+ pts k2 v) -> free k1 (f \+ pts k2 v) = (if k1 == k2 then f else free k1 f \+ pts k2 v)
freePtUn2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k2 v \+ f) -> free k1 (pts k2 v \+ f) = (if k1 == k2 then f else pts k2 v \+ free k1 f)
findUnPt2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (f \+ pts k2 v) -> find k1 (f \+ pts k2 v) = (if k1 == k2 then Some v else find k1 f)
findPtUn2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k2 v \+ f) -> find k1 (pts k2 v \+ f) = (if k1 == k2 then Some v else find k1 f)
findUnL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> find k (f1 \+ f2) = (if k \in dom f1 then find k f1 else find k f2)
freeUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), free k (f1 \+ f2) = (if k \in dom (f1 \+ f2) then free k f1 \+ free k f2 else f1 \+ f2)
cancel2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (f1 f2 : U) (v1 v2 : V), valid (pts k1 v1 \+ f1) -> pts k1 v1 \+ f1 = pts k2 v2 \+ f2 -> if k1 == k2 then v1 = v2 /\ f1 = f2 else [/\ free k1 f2 = free k2 f1, f1 = pts k2 v2 \+ free k1 f2 & f2 = pts k1 v1 \+ free k2 f1]
